structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section:
It is hereby declared:
That it is the policy of this Commonwealth to protect and promote the health, safety, and welfare of the people of the Commonwealth and particularly of the communities in which slum areas and blighted areas exist by the elimination of slum conditions and conditions of blight;
That the elimination of such conditions and the preparation of the land in such areas for sale or lease for development or redevelopment constitute a public use and purpose for which public money may be expended and private property acquired and are governmental functions in the interest of the health, safety, and welfare of the people of the Commonwealth; and
That the necessity in the public interest for the provisions enacted in KRS 99.340 to 99.510 is hereby declared to be a legislative determination.
